title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Weddings
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations     Weddings                Weddings       Many requests are received to use the memorial for various reasons. When such requests are inappropriate, they are denied. Frequently, because of lack of space, funds, staff resources, etc.,even appropriate uses have to be denied; however, compatible, non-commercial (does not involve the buying and selling of goods or services) use of the Borglum View Terrace for weddings is permitted from time to time with a Special Use Permit. For more information, download the Guidelines for Weddings at Mount Rushmore (353 KB PDF) and the map of the designated area (506 KB PDF). Application forms are below: Application for Special Use Permit (Short Form) - 492 KB PDF Application for Special Use Permit (Long Form) - 631 KB PDF
